data.name: Rustler - Murder Madness
data.detailed_description:
Hire Mercenaries
Who wouldn't like for someone else to take the beating instead of them? Well, Guy surely does. Hire mercenaries and let them to fight for you. Let the murder madness begin!

Smash with new weapons
A fast-reloading, agile bow is at your disposal now. Get on a new bowman's horse too and do some robbin hooding.
There's also a brutal Mace if you want to punch your way through some armored knights.

Ride 'em all with a chariot
Grind some meat with one new super-deadly war chariot. Show everyone that a murder party never spares nobody.

Medieval Madness
Complete the new MurderFest challenges, and master the combat bow, mace, and chariot. Become the best-equipped medieval thug anyone has ever heard of.
data.about_the_game:
Hire Mercenaries
Who wouldn't like for someone else to take the beating instead of them? Well, Guy surely does. Hire mercenaries and let them to fight for you. Let the murder madness begin!

A fast-reloading, agile bow is at your disposal now. Get on a new bowman's horse too and do some robbin hooding.

Medieval Madness

data.short_description: Hire different mercenaries to fight in your name. Get new weapons and ride a chariot or a new horse with bonus ammo. Complete the new MurderFest challenges. Become the Murder Man nobody wants, but so many deserve.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i5-3570K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 780
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-4790
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

data.legal_notice:
DISCLAIMER:
Any elements of the game "Rustler" that are inspired by elements of the pop culture are to be seen a parody or caricature.

content_descriptors.notes: There might be a lot of blood and swearing.
